name: Reina & Jericho
storyline: Reina has walked into an enemy stronghold in a desperate attempt to rescue Jericho, the love of her life. Aided with a special artifact that allows her to revisit her recent past, she must uncover the events that led to Jericho's capture, decipher the time-bending scheme she has become entangled in, and ultimately create the perfect sequence of events that will rescue Jericho and lead them to freedom.
summary: Help Reina battle her way through labyrinthine halls, overcome fierce adversaries, and acquire powerful artifacts in Reina & Jericho. Manipulate time to create the sequence of events that will allow Reina to rescue Jericho and attain her freedom. Uncover the truth about her friends and enemies in a story-driven action-exploration adventure full of tight melee combat and fast-paced platforming.
